title: Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Single Casing Fan
cat_seo_title: Corsair Casing Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Corsair Casing Cooler at best price in Bangladesh. Keep your desktop cool with Corsair Casing Cooler. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Single Casing Fan

The Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Fan is designed to enhance both the cooling efficiency and aesthetic appeal of your PC build. This high-performance fan offers versatile functionality with PWM-controlled speeds reaching up to 1,850 RPM, ensuring optimal cooling performance tailored to your system's needs. It delivers an impressive airflow of up to 58.98 cubic feet per minute (CFM) and boasts a static pressure rating of 2.83mm-H2O, making it effective at pushing air through tight spaces and radiators. The Casing fan's sophisticated hydraulic bearing design, which lowers friction and lengthens lifespan, allows it to run silently even with its strong performance, with noise levels ranging from a low of 10 dBA to a maximum of 27.3 dBA. Additionally, Corsair's user-friendly iCUE software can be used to customize lighting effects to a great extent using the AR120's eight independently controllable RGB LEDs. With this program, users may synchronize the fan's illumination with those of other iCUE-compatible devices to create a visually appealing and unified configuration. The RGB lights of the fan may be easily integrated with your motherboard without the need for extra controllers thanks to the supplied 3-pin ARGB adapter. Due to its standard size of 120mm, the AR120 may be easily added to new builds or upgraded into current systems because it is compatible with the majority of PC cases. With its silent operation, programmable RGB lights, and effective cooling, the Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Fan is a great option to improve the look and performance of any PC system.

Buy Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Single Casing Fan from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Single Casing Fan From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Corsair Casing Cooler to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Corsair iCUE AR120 Digital RGB 120mm PWM Single Casing Fan comes with a 2-year warranty.

product_page_short_description: Multi-color LED with adaptive Sync RGB
full_description:
CORSAIR ICUE SP120 RGB PRO 120MM FAN ( Single Pack)

The CORSAIR iCUE SP120 RGB PRO Performance Fan is an excellent choice for cooling. This single fan hosts 8 individually addressable RGB LEDs. So it can be a good choice for the cooling you need and the visuals for impression. You can create amazing RGB lighting effects with 3 fans chaining upto 24 RGB LEDs. These fans have hydraulic Bearings. These fans are equipped with translucent 120mm fan blades; which provides high airflow and static pressure while letting your RGB lighting shine through. The biggest downside is no PWM control. But these fans are compatible with CORSAIR iCUE software and Adaptive Sync RGB. You can connect up to 6x SP120 RGB fans to the included iCUE Lighting Node CORE compact RGB lighting controller. You can easily create dazzling lighting patterns and effects with powerful CORSAIR iCUE software. CORSAIR iCUE software brings your system to life with dynamic RGB lighting synchronized across all your iCUE compatible products, including fans, RGB LED light strips, keyboards, mice and more.

Superior cooling performance

Now this RGB PRO fan offer something more than just great visuals. And that is superior cooling performance for your components. This fan can speed up to 1,400 RPM, pushing up to 52 CFM of air for superior cooling. These fans have a dimensions of 120mm x 120mm x 25mm. They uses Hydraulic type Bearing. This fan is capable delivering a Static Pressure Flow for unprecedented cooling performance. The operating Voltage is from 7V to 13.2V. This fan is from SP Series and the weight is around 0.135 Kgs. The Fan can have a rotation speed of around 1400 RPM. The sound level for this fans is nearly 26 dBA with a lower power draw of 0.30 Amp. The static Pressure of this fans is around 1.45 mm H2O which has a fan airflow of around 52 Cubic Feet per Meter. CORSAIR ICUE SP120 RGB PRO 120mm fan single pack offers 02 year of warranty.

title: Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan
cat_seo_title: Corsair Casing Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Corsair Casing Cooler at best price in Bangladesh. Keep your desktop cool with Corsair Casing Cooler. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan

The Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan features a Fluid Dynamic Bearing fan and is only 15mm thick, making it suitable for practically any PC build or small-factor case. It provides powerful airflow while taking up little space. The AF SLIM Series is a low-profile variant of our highest-performing fan that fits compact form factor builds and offers comparable airflow at 56.3 CFM to the normal AF120 ELITE, the perfect blend of low noise and high performance. Allows for builds when full-size fans simply will not fit. The Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan ITX is very difficult to build and maintain. The durability of the fans is more crucial here than anywhere else. Fluid dynamic bearings in AF SLIM fans use lubricants to reduce friction between the shaft and bearings, delivering remarkable longevity and low noise.

Low-Noise Design

The Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan is designed to be low-noise, spinning as softly as 27.5 dBa. When your computer is not in use, Corsair's Zero RPM mode eliminates fan noise. Only when temperatures hit the threshold you set in Corsair's iCUE software with a Corsair Commander fan controller will fans start spinning.

Buy Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Corsair AF120 SLIM 120mm PWM Casing Fan From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Corsair Casing Fan to purchase for your Desktop PC. full_description:
Corsair AF120 ELITE High-Performance 120mm PWM Casing Fan

The Corsair AF120 ELITE high-performance 120mm PWM casing fan is ideal for your PC, providing optimal airflow to keep components cool at low to medium speeds. It comes with an airflow of up to 59.1 CFM at a maximum of 1,850 RPM, AF ELITE series fans provide the ideal balance of low noise, high static pressure, and high airflow without sacrificing performance. The AF ELITE series fan rotates as quietly as 31.5 dBa thanks to its low-noise design. AF ELITE fans are designed to support Zero RPM Mode, which uses CORSAIR's iCUE software and a CORSAIR COMMANDER fan controller (sold separately) to eliminate fan noise when temperatures reach a threshold you set. The Corsair AF120 ELITE high-performance 120mm PWM casing reduces friction with the fluid dynamic bearing shaft and lubricant between the fan's bearings, ensuring exceptional durability and lifespan with minimal noise.

full_description:
Corsair AF120 ELITE High-Performance 120mm PWM Casing Fan White

The Corsair AF120 ELITE High-Performance 120mm PWM Casing Fan White is excellent for your PC, offering optimal airflow to keep components cool at low to medium speeds. With an airflow of up to 59.1 CFM at a maximum speed of 1,850 RPM, the AF ELITE series fans deliver the optimal blend of low noise, high static pressure, and high airflow without losing performance. Because to its low-noise construction, the AF ELITE series fan may rotate as silently as 31.5 dBa. AF ELITE fans are designed to support Zero RPM Mode, which employs CORSAIR's iCUE software and a CORSAIR COMMANDER fan controller (available separately) to remove fan noise when temperatures reach a preset threshold. The Corsair AF120 ELITE high-performance 120mm PWM casing lowers friction with the fluid dynamic bearing shaft and lubrication between the fan's bearings, ensuring remarkable reliability and longevity with little noise.

full_description:
Corsair ML120 Pro RGB Casing Fan (1 Unit)

The CORSAIR ML120 PRO RGB PWM fan combines unrivaled performance and low noise operation, by utilizing magnetic levitation bearing technology, with vibrant RGB lighting controlled in CORSAIR iCUE software. By utilizing ultra-low friction magnetic levitation bearing technology, ML120 PRO RGB can deliver more airflow and higher static pressure at lower noise levels than traditional bearing fans, backed by a long-life five-year warranty. Four hub-mounted RGB LEDs output a vivid blast of light and color, making it easy to match your systemâ€™s style. Available as a kit with Lighting Node PRO, control lighting effects and airflow in CORSAIR iCUE and add the finishing touches with replaceable corner caps (sold separately). The RGB functionality of ML120 PRO RGB requires an RGB lighting hub and Lighting Node PRO. With a 400 to 1,600 RPM PWM control range at 25 dBA max, ML120 PRO RGB makes it easy to equip your PC with quiet cooling that can be adjusted for the perfect balance in airflow that your system needs. CORSAIR iCUE software brings your system to life with dynamic RGB lighting synchronized across all your iCUE compatible products, including fans, RGB LED light strips, keyboards, mice and more.

product_page_short_description: Multi-color LED with adaptive Sync RGB
full_description:
CORSAIR ICUE SP120 RGB ELITE Fan White Triple Pack

The CORSAIR iCUE SP120 RGB elite triple Fan Kit hosts 24 individually addressable RGB LEDs. There are eight on each fan. So it can be a good choice for the cooling you need and the visuals for impression. You can create amazing RGB lighting effects with these 24 RGB LEDs. These fans are equipped with translucent 120mm fan blades; which provides high airflow and static pressure while letting your RGB lighting shine through. But these fans are compatible with CORSAIR iCUE software and Adaptive Sync RGB. These fans have the lowest noise level of 7dBA. This cooler fans have intelligent Control with the iCUE compact RGB lighting controller. You can connect up to 6x SP120 RGB fans to the included iCUE Lighting Node CORE compact RGB lighting controller. You can easily create dazzling lighting patterns and effects with powerful CORSAIR iCUE software. CORSAIR iCUE software brings your system to life with dynamic RGB lighting synchronized across all your iCUE compatible products, including fans, RGB LED light strips, keyboards, mice and more. These Fans are CORSAIR Air Guide Technology supported. Every SP 120 RGB Elite series fan utilizes anti-vortex vanes. They direct airflow and concentrate cooling, improving cooling whether used as intake, exhaust, or mounted to a liquid cooling radiator or even a heat sink. Now these RGB PRO fans offer something more than just great visuals. And that is superior cooling performance for your components. These fans has a speed from 400 up to 1500 RPM, pushing up to 47.7 CFM of air for superior cooling. These fans have a dimensions of 120mm x 120mm x 25mm. They uses Hydraulic type Bearing. These fans are capable delivering a Static Pressure Flow for unprecedented cooling performance. The operating Voltage is from 7V to 13.2V. These fans are from SP Series and the weight is around 0.135 Kgs. The Fans can have a rotation speed of around 1400 RPM. The sound level for these fans are 7 dBA with a lower power draw of 0.30 Amp. The static Pressure of these fans are around 1.46 mm-H2O which has a fan airflow of around 47.7 Cubic Feet per Meter. The dimension of each fan is 120mm x 120mm x 25mm while the weight is around 0.135 kg for each fan. The fan kit comes in a pack of 03 fans and it has a 2 year warranty.

full_description:
Corsair iCUE LINK QX120 RGB 3 in 1 120mm PWM Case Fan Starter Kit with iCUE LINK System Hub

The Corsair iCUE LINK QX120 RGB 3 in 1 120mm PWM Case Fan has three high-performance case fans that can be managed and configured using the iCUE software. These fans are fitted with RGB LEDs that can produce amazing lighting effects and sync with other iCUE-compatible devices. The fans are also PWM-controlled, allowing them to change their speed in response to the system's temperature and load. The iCUE LINK QX120 RGB fans are quiet and efficient, with a speed range of 400 to 2400 RPM and a sound level of 10 to 37 dBA. The fans have a static pressure design that allows them to push air through small openings and limitations like radiators and heatsinks. The static pressure of the Corsair iCUE LINK QX120 RGB Case Fans is 0.17 to 3.8 mm-H2O, and the airflow is 16.44 to 63.1 CFM, making them excellent for cooling different components. The package also includes an iCUE LINK System Hub, which connects up to six iCUE LINK QX120 RGB fans and two RGB LED strips to the motherboard and allows the iCUE software to operate them. The hub also has a power draw of 1.02A so it can provide enough power for the fans and the LEDs. The Corsair iCUE LINK QX120 RGB 3 in 1 120mm PWM Case Fan Starter Kit with iCUE LINK System Hub is a great option for anyone who wants to enhance the performance and aesthetics of their PC case.
